item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Total Drama S03-S06 1080p (HappyKids.tv)
item.description:
Hello! Some Total Drama seasons have recently been uploaded in 1080p to HappyKids, a platform downloadable on both Microsoft Store and App Store. I'm not familiar with the ways one would use to rip the episodes from there, so if anyone could help me with that, I would highly appreciate it!

All seasons are welcome but I am mostly looking for World Tour (S03).

Total Drama seasons available on HappyKids:

World Tour (S03) - 26 episodes
Revenge of the Island (S04) - 13 episodes
All Stars & Pahkitew Island (S05) - 26 episodes
The Ridonculous Race (S06) - 26 episodes

Platform link:

https://happykids.tv/

Total Drama is available under the Tweens section on the main page of the platform.
item.author: ALMisborn1212
